Title: Worldsoul: Cinderbrew Meadery
Description:
Ah, Cinderbrew. It really is as stout and fiery a brew as they claim.

I can't help but imagine it's how Beledar would taste...

The earthen love it! And it's an important part of their heritage. And so we can't let their meadery fall into the wrong hands.

But... watch out for the cinderbees. I hear their stingers are... well, I won't scare you with that. But I am glad I'm leaving this to you.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Cinderbrew Meadery dungeon on Heroic difficulty or higher.
